name: CarTrauma_prototype
description:
A - left, D - right, W - throttle, SPACE - brake, S - reverse

This is a prototype for my first ever computer game - an arcade survival horror driving game - as part of a Game Jam.

As you can see it is still very bare bones, and I intend to upload updates as the game jam progresses. Enjoy driving around and watching the red pill slowly chase you :)

I'm new to itch.io and the GameDev scene, so feel free to give any tips and tricks! This is a hobby project.

Game Jam: Themed Horror Game Jam #4

Engine used: Godot
